body.p: To avoid double‑counting, estimates of future cash flows do not include:

li.p: cash inflows from assets that generate cash inflows that are largely independent of the cash inflows from the asset under review (for example, financial assets such as receivables); and
cash outflows that relate to obligations that have been recognised as liabilities (for example, payables, pensions or provisions).
